OrgName.entry: UNIVERSITY OF SHEFFIELD, CATERING SERVICES DEPARTMENT - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: University Food Court, capacity 250. City View Coffee Lounge, capacity 100. The Common Room (formerly The Foyer Restaurant Room), capacity 100. Abbeydale Room, capacity 90 seated.
